leawind_third_person.text.title: Leawind's Third Person
leawind_third_person.option_category.cam: Adjusts the player's position on the screen and other parameters. You don't need to manually adjust the options on this page because it can be done in-game by holding Z and using the mouse.
leawind_third_person.option_category.smo: Smooth factors represent the smoothness level of various smoothing effects. A smooth factor of 0 is equivalent to no smoothing, meaning an immediate reach to the target value. A smooth factor of 1 is equivalent to infinite smoothness, meaning it will never reach the target value.
leawind_third_person.option_group.camera: In third person mode, holding specific keys allows adjusting the camera-to-player distance with the scroll wheel. Here, you can set the adjustment range for the distance.
leawind_third_person.option_group.aiming: When aiming with bows, crossbows, spears, etc.
leawind_third_person.option.is_mod_enabl: Disabling will display the original third-person view. But you can still open config menu by pressing specified key.
leawind_third_person.option.player_rotat: Forcing the player's gaze to be parallel to the camera's gaze when not aiming
leawind_third_person.option.rotate_to_mo: When player moving, does player auto rotate to the moving direction?
leawind_third_person.option.available_di: Use the mouse scroll wheel to adjust the camera-to-player distance. The value of this option is the number of distance levels.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_dista: Minimum distance from the player when adjusting with the scroll wheel.
Maximum distance from the player when adjusting with the scroll wheel.
leawind_third_person.option.distance_smo: When the player is stationary, the change in distance between the camera and the player to the target distance is smoothed by this factor.
leawind_third_person.option.offset_cente: Hold specific keys can center the view. When centered, X offset is fixed at 0, and the player is in the center of the screen. This option adjusts the Y offset in this state.
leawind_third_person.option.camera_ray_t: Camera Line of Sight Detection Distance
When aiming at an object beyond this distance, the player's line of sight will be parallel to the camera line of sight.
leawind_third_person.option.projectile_a: When aiming at a block or entity, automatically adjust the shooting angle to hit the target.
key.leawind_third_person.toggle_side: Toggle Camera to the Other Side
